vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Planned Development District No. 543, in an area bounded by Reiger Avenue, Paulus Avenue, Covington Lane, and North Glasgow Drive
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a revised Exhibit 543A development plan, revised Exhibit 543B traffic management plan, and revised conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a revised Exhibit 543A development plan, revised Exhibit 543B traffic management plan, and revised conditions 
Z212-237(AU)
